name: Lunar10s
description:
A game I made over weekend for the Mini Jam 130. It is also a first game jam and my first complete game. In total I worked on it around 16 hours. My goal was to submit at least something which I technically did :) 

The game is kinda rough, needs a ton more polish, balancing and content. 

Your goal is to defend your base from moon bugs using giant solar powered laser.
